R

receiveMessage() - Method in class network.Communication
this method allows to receive a message from a client
receiveObject(String) - Method in class network.Communication
this method allows to receive a object (picture) from a client
Receiver - Class in network
this class allows to run a thread to wait to receive a message during a discussion

this is the constructor of the class with a communication in parameter

this method allows to add an observer at the list of observer

remove(Object) - Method in class model.ContactList
